website_summaries.verdict: A cleverly designed and intuitive smart sprinkler controller that won't break the bank.
pros: Complies with local water regulations and restrictions
Utilizes weather forecasts to automatically adjust watering schedules and volumes
Self learning feature compiles a personalized schedule based on in-app user history
Handy plant library with more than 1,000 species
cons: Lack of clear instructions can cause some initial hiccups, but these are usually quickly resolved thanks to excellent customer service

customer_reviews.title: Needs some bug fixes but all around good product.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. Easy to install and easy to work off the app. However I bought this because it was tied into the local weather and local rain restrictions based off of my address. Needless to say the restrictions dont seem to be taking effect as the sprinklers are going off in the rain and snow. It also disconnects from the internet a lot on it's own. I have to constantly recycle the power to get it to connect. If they can fix those two issues with a firmware update it will be prime product. Lots of zones, you can monitor your water usage and customize areas. There is a really good support community forum as well.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good but app not great
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking unit and easy to install. The app in theory looks great but it’s lacking in many areas. I’m in Texas and the watering schedule is way wrong. Defaults to 100% soil moisture level with no override. Also, displays that I received nearly 1inch of rain in the last 3 days. My water gage says a trace. I’m hoping they improve some of these issues. If they do it will be 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: cjlizzard

customer_reviews.title: Best sprinkler clock I have seen
customer_reviews.text: This clock is great. Was a snap to install and app is intuitive and works great. My old clock was mounted in my garage and not easy to see or setup due to a boat in close proximity. Now I can run the clock and setup everything on my phone. Really nice to run individual zones while working on adjustments to sprinklers using just my phone. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Easy install/Auto-magic watering schedule.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was very easy. Just note the color coded wires from the old control unit and detach it from the wall. Measure and mount the Netro and attach the new wires matching the zone numbers with the old unit. Use the app to setup and go. I installed this yesterday it's running the system today, per-local watering restrictions, *all by itself* I didn't need to fiddle around programming each of the zones. Added picture after 2years of use and no interaction with the device. Does a great job and I don't even think about it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Manning

customer_reviews.title: Awesome transition to WiFi from analog timers
customer_reviews.text: This product replaced a 10 station old analog switch timer. It went in easily, the wiring wasn’t too bad with some trial and error. My only concern is over time will the app continue to work if the company doesn’t exist, since it doesn’t have any manual way to operate it. But I think it’s awesome
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy setup and huge upgrade from my previous rainbird. App is super responsive and gives you recommendations how much to water your lawn. One downside is that there is no physical button for manual irrigation, so my gardener cannot adjust sprinklers without me. Overall it is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ondrej Nebesky

customer_reviews.title: Great wifi controller and great app.
customer_reviews.text: I am impress with this. We got this for my parents because they needed an easy way to program their sprinkler. We were really looking for a wifi one so this was definitely a bonus. It was easy to use. The app is top rated. We can do multiple schedules and even vary each station. We were wary at first because the price was lower than many of the other wifi ones. By the way, installation was so easy and programming it was just as easy.
customer_reviews.author: TXCustomer

customer_reviews.title: This controller is amazing! I've had it a few weeks now
customer_reviews.text: This controller is amazing! I've had it a few weeks now. It was super easy to install in our rental. I was able to program the app for each zone with our soil type, vegetation type, slope or not, and shady or sunny, and the app automatically waters based on local weather conditions and my programmed zone types. It takes the thinking out of sprinkler programming, or running over to the rental to turn water off if it rains.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gilcher

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have already told two buddies about it and they got them and loved them. My only recommendation is to add a pool filler on the zones. My sprinkler also fills my pool but I have to constantly manually tune that setting.
customer_reviews.author: Matt MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Great customer service. The product was simple to install and set up. I believed I had an issue with the device and contacted customer service. While no one answered the phone, I did receive an email within hours and they worked through my issue (turns out it was an error on my side). Xi was courteous and patient. I would recommend that the develop a program (perhaps enhanced) that would run off my PC. Competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kiere

customer_reviews.title: control is initiated with my smart phone. No long will I be walking back ...
customer_reviews.text: Being a skeptic old school irrigation controller kind of guy... Definitely had my doubts. However, after installing, and configuring this device... Wow! Incredible amount of data in the app, yet it's laid out neatly, and not overwhelming. Decided to set the device to "smart zone", and all the guesswork is eliminated! When working on the system, control is initiated with my smart phone. No long will I be walking back and forth from controller to valve! I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: servuona737

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied! My wife bought this Netro sprinkler controller as ...
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied! My wife bought this Netro sprinkler controller as a gift knowing I wanted to add a remote control to my existing system. Since it didn’t have one of the major sprinkler co brand labels on it, I was a bit skeptical. I have been very impressed as installation and setup was very quick and easy! All zones worked immediately controlled by my iPhone. Very impressed so far with the App that uses weather predictions and local water regulations to determine when to water. I no longer need to run around the yard chasing zones when I want to check sprinkler zones. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M

customer_reviews.title: It was really easy to set up - much easier than I expected
customer_reviews.text: After doing much research on different products, I selected Netro because of its zone flexibility. I wanted to be able to water different zones at different times on different days. This unit really does the trick. It was really easy to set up - much easier than I expected. Just make sure you take a picture of your current wiring and follow the instructions exactly. When I DID have a question about programming, customer service was very quick, and they can even change some settings for you remotely, if you prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Steven E Wright

customer_reviews.title: Netro Sprite was my SMART buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m feeling very SMART for purchasing this product after shopping for a smart sprinkler controller myself! I could have replaced my Rain Master with a smart Rain Master for $300 or more or I could purchase Netro for $125ish. The setup is very easy and I’m loving programming my water sprinkler system while sitting in my recliner!! Tech support guy was very helpful and called me back soon after I emailed tech support. (My connectivity issue was due to a malfunctioning router. As soon as AT&T replaced my router, my Sprite automatically connected!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and setup system.
customer_reviews.text: Just followed the Quick Start guide. Easy installation and no problems setting up. I setup my schedules manually to have control of the time of day and length of run time. It’s already run through a couple of cycles. I don’t use any product that has Alexa, so I can’t rate Alexa interface. I haven’t needed to contact Tech Support, so I can’t rate it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Griswold

customer_reviews.title: Best Smart Device I've bought so far
customer_reviews.text: I love my Netro. Setup was way less painless than most other devices I have, and the wifi connection is strong (hasn't dropped yet). The customer service is quick and amazing (note I haven't had an issue, just reported that my local restrictions weren't listed). I typically research items for weeks before I buy them, I was shocked I hadn't heard of the Netro before. Went with this over Rachio and happy. Working with my Alexa, and just waiting for them to finish up the google assistant support and I'll be set. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Cole Tiwater

customer_reviews.title: Easy operation
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like my Toro's controller. This unit has an easy operation using your iphone. Only the drawback is no control panel at all on the unit, so if you have no iphone with you, you cannot operate your sprinkler.
customer_reviews.author: YMcoffee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I bought this a year ago and it’s easy to install both on the wall and to hook up with WI-FI. The biggest challenge I find is if I need to test my sprinkler zones, I need my mobile all the time. Overall I recommend this for small # of zones and one that is not heavily used.
customer_reviews.author: Krishna

customer_reviews.title: Installation, set up and support
customer_reviews.text: We had a 14 year old Rain Bird controller for 10 zones - bulky and became unreliable. I am a female - not techy but resourceful. I sent my wiring diagram to Netro to answer a question for me. They responded timely and I was up and running without a glitch. I love the flexibility with setting up zones.
customer_reviews.author: thc-kc

customer_reviews.title: Good controller. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the money. It has essentially all the features I need. Still trying to get the watering level right as what I selected for my soil type and square footage isn't translating to sufficient water to keep the lawn green everywhere. That's adjustable, although not very flexibly.
customer_reviews.author: Snort

customer_reviews.title: Technology simplified for your sprinkler system!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly and easy install. Phone app works great. The ability to label with photos is a nice feature. Plenty smart features and very convenient to control zones with a press of a button on your phone. No more running back and forth to the garage!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T

customer_reviews.title: take charge of your lawn / plant watering
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and get started. Great customization options in App. Easy to use App.
customer_reviews.author: Magnus Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: The installation was seamless. Once I got familiar with the app the programming was fairly straightforward. It has more features than I will ever use but for others this might be a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: You can not add a traditional rain sensor
customer_reviews.text: The app and the timer work great for a homeowner. I have had 3-4 different ones in the past. Their watering sensor (sold separately) is garbage. I miss my rain sensor. It rained almost 2 inches last night and it ran this morning. Please note you can not add a conventional rain sensor to this timer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easiest sprinkler controller to use
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! It’s completely controlled by an app on the phone. There are no buttons on the unit. Simply plug in wires and power up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Singletary

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! We had large water usage with our old system and over watering, The Netro manages all that for you, Install was very easy and set up was flawless, Easy to label the zones and take a picture of each aera in the app, I even purchased a second unit for our pool house, highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: chris j muzio

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great design with easy installation and the app works great. Fully functional app that works well with monitoring weather forecast and watering as needed. Great product! Emailed Tech Support about a App update and they included it in the next release. Great response and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: sydlaws

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Still learning how to use it's different features.
customer_reviews.author: John K. King

customer_reviews.title: I've been through it installing other smart home devices trying to get them to work as ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been through it installing other smart home devices trying to get them to work as promised. This Smart Sprinkler was so easy to install and it worked on the first time! I I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great system, my thumb is turning more green by ...
customer_reviews.text: Great system, my thumb is turning more green by the day! Thanks to the auto watering system, your controller is saving the lives of multiple plants in my yard!
customer_reviews.author: Darren K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good customer service, well-designed app, will update with more details later.
customer_reviews.author: David E.

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Wow so far this is what I was waiting for! Great product, at the right price! Easy to install, easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s smarter than a programmable sprinkler.
customer_reviews.text: This is better than automation, you don’t have to set a schedule, they manage it for you based on the weather in your area. If it’s going to rain tomorrow, they skip the watering today. Water more when it’s a heatwave. It’s nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Simple app based sprinkler controller.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very compact and easy to install a d setup. The app is also easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Atif Khan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of my best purchases ever. It was easy to set up and install and use. Being able to remotly turn on and off the sprinklers has saved time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Squire

customer_reviews.title: Awesome after sales service
customer_reviews.text: Awesome after sales service. I had a problem with the power supply and the tech was excellent. The netro has been working excellent since the incident.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and it pays for itself quickly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and I saved $100 on my monthly bill in the first month.
customer_reviews.author: papakofe

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and works great
customer_reviews.text: Simple and effective... works as advertised and the app is really easy to work with.... set up was a breeze took 5 mins tops... you can't go wrong... no physical buttons on the unit so everything is done through the app
customer_reviews.author: Bryan D.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Wireless
customer_reviews.text: Wireless connection is not stable and unit is offline even though I have AP in close proximity to the unit.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sydor

customer_reviews.title: Netro Smart 12-Zone WiFi Sprinkler Controller- Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old bohemoth 12-zone sprinkler controller with this modern-looking wifi controller in my garage. Connects to home network from the other end of the house just fine(prob 60' thru 3 or 4 walls). App is easy to use & offers versatile programming options. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hammett

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, THE BEST I can find anywhere.  Does ALL AND MORE than what I need.
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our very old system and this one works great! Easy to instal and very easy and smart app to control the watering. Since my valve is old and it wouldn't know the exact zone, I have to be careful to make sure it runs all 4 zones each time, so it wouldn't skip by smart watering, otherwise it would start where it stopped. and I don't really need to water much zone 3 and 4. Eventually I would need to get 4 valves for each zone to fully use this system with smart watering. But I still love it as it's my fault for having very outdated valve outside.
customer_reviews.author: GLP

customer_reviews.title: Truely, Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Easy to install and use and for this price, 5 Wows! A couple more written set up instructions might have been nice (enable the zones before setting up the schedule), but it was all easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Kachikis

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLE
customer_reviews.text: So simple to install, just like the ad states. A few minutes exploring with the app and it was setup. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, took about 15 min. The app is easy to use too.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to install, connecting to WIFI was a breeze. I had it set up on a schedule within the hour. Alexa setup was also easy.
customer_reviews.author: Lojix

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer support. I had a problem with reconnecting ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding customer support. I had a problem with reconnecting to my wifi. Jason handled it professionally. After several tries were unsuccessful, I was referred to a technician and solve the problem by connecting to a hotspot.
customer_reviews.author: Tatuy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more pleased with this product. The installation was a snap. The app is fantastic. The customer support is top notch!! They will call you back right away!!! I researched for a smart controller and so lucky I found this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Smart System for home
customer_reviews.text: Great Customer Service. Product looks nice and sleek. Works well and have a good user interface. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!  It just works
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the controller installed for a week, but so far I like it. I had a dumb controller for years but I wanted something I could control remotely. This did the trick and I really like the intelligence that is used to build your schedule. I have only had it installed for a week, but the install was easy, and setting up the app was pretty nice on my Android phone. Once I get a chance to see how it works over time I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: S. Guagliardo

customer_reviews.title: Great sprinkler controller
customer_reviews.text: Great sprinkler controller. Super easy setup and high accuracy weather data saved me time, energy/effort and most importantly water usage!
customer_reviews.author: C. Riehn

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, user friendly interface and most importantly, make managing my lawn a breeze.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a basic 6 zone controller, and to add the ability to control my irrigation system without having to stumble around in my garage. Couldn't be happier with this unit and it's app.
customer_reviews.author: Jon L Mammen

customer_reviews.title: Great equiment and Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in Apr 2017 and its been just 3 months and its not working anymore. I set it up and had working for 3 months and all of a sudden it doesn't connect anymore. Now my grass all turned gray which made me realize something is wrong with it. *** Updated 08/06/2017 *** Amazing customer service. I have been contacted, resent new module overnight and tried to understand my concern and see how they can help me with lawn too. This is an amazing customer service I have ever seen by any company. Things are working good and appreciate all the help from Netro team.
customer_reviews.author: Anil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set-up, works as described, I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tim B.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't meet my needs
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the user manual before buying this product. I have low-flow sprinklers and have to run more than one zone at a time and run each zone almost two hours. (Due to watering restrictions, I can't spread my watering out over a longer period.) This controller does not allow for multiple zones to operate concurrently and when manually selecting a zone to be watered the controller will not allow a time frame longer than 60 minutes. In short, didn't meet my needs. Returned it and went with a BlueSpray which is much more robust and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and install with clear installation instructions
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and install with clear installation instructions. Zones were simple to setup and after downloading app, had sprinklers controlled in a matter of minutes. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at smart irrigation controls for a while but hadn't taken the leap until I saw this model. Easy to install, simple to use, and a great price. I even needed support on a local watering regulation, and the customer support team responded to my request AND fixed the issue within a day. So far, a great experience.
customer_reviews.author: S. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Will not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Netro device hardware is very cheap quality. Front face of this device will not close and is only hold by 2 small plastic mole. Apps is also very lousy. Every time i go out of my home it shows offline. Now way to fix it. This irrigation systen is no way smart. Will water even if it rained last two night. Openned support ticket they were not able to resolve it. Support sits in India and only way to contact them is by leaving a support message through app. Will not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vip

customer_reviews.title: This controller is great!
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical after just being launched but this product is great! I had an old Hunter timer that was replaced in minutes by the Netro Smart controller. I set up each zone being 'smart' and is already scheduling my cycles using the current weather forecast. I fact, I set up my 'manual' schedule from my hunter and the app already realized it was raining outside and turned off the schedule immediately for today! It took me a total of about 30 minutes to hook up, install the app and set up my zones. Couldn't be happier! Now the kids will love it so I can turn on the sprinklers on any given hot day from my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: billnoble6894

customer_reviews.title: Customer user for 2 year
customer_reviews.text: Hands down one of my favorite Wifi enabled products. The ease of use and the Algorithm that is used is a true "set it and forget it" product. I can't believe how great my lawn looks with half of the water used. Ability to set your required restrictions from city ordinances. The price is by far the best for the product for the money. I have recommended to friends and family that all love it as well. Super easy to install as well. This product is a 10!
customer_reviews.author: Ammon Ziebarth

customer_reviews.title: Great Support and Product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Setting up programs and stations is extremely easy. No more running to the controller to test stations. Support at Netro is awesome. Responsive and informative. I’ve had 3 different questions and all answered in a reasonable amount of time. Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: William J.

customer_reviews.title: Forget the rest, get the best - Netro
customer_reviews.text: After dealing with Rainbirds forever, with it's impossible to figure out zones n times, it is such a relief someone finally sat down and reimagined irrigation systems. Netro took no time at all to install, download the app, and have it up and running. What a godsend. Thank you, thank you, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: couchrider

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!  Support is great too!
customer_reviews.text: Went with my gut on purchasing this smart controller over the others and have been very happy I did. Quick and easy setup! Just amazed at how much water it has saved in less than a week by using the smart watering feature. Love being able to use phone to turn a zone on to test without having to go to the basement like I did before. I'm so pleased with it I will be purchasing one for home as well.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect for everyone.......almost!
customer_reviews.text: Got it today and intrigued by it's intuitive design. Only time will tell if it's truly a "5", but definitely has potential to be. I fiddle with electronics constantly from building computers, installing my own complete sprinkler system, totally wiring up a 2 story home and installing a hybrid alarm system with smart home features. I read all reviews and have my own thoughts on the "1" ratings. Some people just are not ready to operate new technology. I am 67 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Jaindl

customer_reviews.title: Great controller choice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this controller so far. Been using now for months and not many issues at all. You do need strong wifi, but it picks up quite well compared to other outdoor wifi solutions. Great upgrade for any antiquated controllers and easy replacement.
customer_reviews.author: RickC

customer_reviews.title: You have to manually set grass type for each zone ...
customer_reviews.text: You have to manually set grass type for each zone and provide area for each zone. But once you do that, you never have to open the app or worry about watering. It knows rain forecast, local regulations.
customer_reviews.author: Vinay Goel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, with every penny
customer_reviews.text: Super easy setup and installation. I love the configuration options and the ability to specify what is being watered and what type of sprinklers are in each zone. Got an email after signing up for the app from the owner checking in. I had some suggestions and got a reply addressing each of my bullet points. Really great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great controller
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Easy to install and works perfectly. We have had a lot of rain on the east coast and the controller has kept my sprinklers off during these wet spells. Works better than the rain gauge I had on my last controller since it can foresee any rain coming in the future and knows how much rain we had to know when to water again.
customer_reviews.author: stanpen

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase a different one.
customer_reviews.text: Useful. I was told it was able to read the weather from the internet, and not water when raining. I would have purchased a different unit if this was clear.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Ames

customer_reviews.title: Jury still out
customer_reviews.text: Suppose to replace older Rainbird system. Takes some getting used to but hopefully will produce savings we expect.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great convience
customer_reviews.text: Not enough people with this device in my region for it to learn. I set a schedule and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Controller
customer_reviews.text: Awesome controller. Flawless and tons of options. For the price, best one on the market hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Best controller I've used
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time with anything else. This is the easiest install and setup. I bought this for both of my houses. My grass has never looked better. Price is unbeatable for the features.
customer_reviews.author: TheMegas

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely 5 star!
customer_reviews.text: Works well as advertised. Easy but precise configuration. Flexible programs and restrictions together with smart zones. Can also run each/every zone at overview page immediately for specified time.
customer_reviews.author: benyuecindy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup but you need a cell phone for operation, no computer access.
customer_reviews.author: A. Juan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, simple
customer_reviews.text: Very simple/basic design. Easy to install if you've had a previous sprinkler system. Scheduling is very customizable via the app which works great. No complaints, great product
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lentini

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The app was designed well, but it only worked for two days. After the two days, the app would not turn the sprinkler valves on.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Setup was easy and it's done a good job this summer of ...
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy and it's done a good job this summer of keeping the grass green with little to no input from me. Support from the company is great. Out of the blue, a Netro developer emailed me to say that my unit wasn't working as expected. It was rebooting itself several times a day. It was still taking care of the watering, so I hadn't noticed. They wanted to send me a replacement, and they did. Cool company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked really good for me
customer_reviews.text: good product for a decent price. It was very easy to install and worked perfect. I like the auto scheduling.
customer_reviews.author: Conrado B Lima

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Truly is a 15-minute setup. Works remotely on my smartphone through the app as promised and integrates the weather info for adjusting water schedules. Super intuitive! Anxious awaiting the Whisperer sensors to come out to pair with the controller.
customer_reviews.author: T. Eller

customer_reviews.title: Good and Intelligent Product .
customer_reviews.text: I have this for about 3 months now and I can see the Difference in the Dawn how green it is vs how it was and really love the product . Initially Had some hiccups but the support was excellent in Resolving or Explaining them to me. I can`t think now how I was surviving without the Smart Controller .
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Very intuitive and easy to set watering schedule
customer_reviews.text: Synced up with my wi-fi right away. Very intuitive and easy to set watering schedule.
customer_reviews.author: jpvegas

customer_reviews.title: Terrible wifi interface, may only work with a few routers.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible wifi connection! I am a software engineer and setting up wifi system is my expertise. This device seems to only work with maybe a few brands and that's it. I tried 4 different routers all of which with 2.4 GHz support (including Google wifi system and ATT 5268AC router). This device could not connect to any of these routers. The company could just spend 10 more dollars and equipped the device with a decent wifi system. Feel terrible for wasting 2h on setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Seyed Mohammad Khansari Zadeh

customer_reviews.title: simple and effective product
customer_reviews.text: simple and effective product which allows me to control the watering schedule of my yard from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: An Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Netro Smart Sprinkler Controller, WiFi, Weather aware, Remote access, 12 Zone, Compatible with Alexa
feature_bullets: Fully Automatic - EPA WaterSense certified, dynamically creates and adjusts watering schedules optimized for your plants/lawns
Lifetime Cloud Service - Connects to WiFi(2.4G), monitors and controls your sprinkler system anywhere from iOS(8.3+), Android(5.0+) devices and Web browsers
Eco Friendly - Save up to 50% of your outdoor water use with advanced water saving technologies including weather forecasting and historical statistics
Water Restriction - Alerts and auto complies to the watering rules in your local area
Easy Installation - Installs or replaces in around 15 minutes with basic tools. No professionals required. Indoor use only
